title: Burrito
brief: when you want a little of everything
description: when you want a little of everything, packed with quinoa, red beans, sweet peppers, vegan meat and black rice. serves with cashew sauce

title: Veggie burger
brief: These veggie burgers are packed with vegetables!
description: Try our veggie burgers that are hearty, flavorful and full of vegetables. These delicious vegetable-packed burgers are high in fiber and come in at just under 200 calories for one patty

title: Avocado and peas bowl
brief: This delicious salad is loaded with avocado
description: This delicious salad is loaded with avocado, peas, sweet corn and finished off with a honey-cumin dressing

title: Chocolate cake
description: The best vegan chocolate cake, moist, rich and fluffy

title: Brownies
brief: Fudgy and gooey in the middle with the crackly tops
description: Gooey, chewy, and loaded with tons of chocolate chips.

title: Ice cream
brief: With our ice cream, you can have a sweet tooth and be in the pink of health too!
description: With our ice cream, you can have a sweet tooth and be in the pink of health too! choose from these flavours: Mango, strawberry or chocolate

title: Cheese cake
brief: gluten-free cheesecakes that are creamy, slightly tart, perfectly sweet, and 100% irresistible.
description: gluten-free cheesecakes that are creamy, slightly tart, perfectly sweet, and 100% irresistible.

title: Green smoothie
description: Healty and delicious smoothie, full of greens

title: Bluberry smoothie
brief: A smoothie with strawberries, blueberries and banana is delicately sweet and entirely kid-friendly and extra frosty texture.
description: A smoothie with strawberries, blueberries and banana is delicately sweet and entirely kid-friendly and extra frosty texture.

title: Spicy mango Margaritas
brief: These margaritas get sweetness from mango nectar instead of simple syrup.
description: These margaritas get sweetness from mango nectar instead of simple syrup. The nectar adds a refreshingly tropical flavor that pairs nicely with muddled jalape√±o and the spicy seasoning along the rim of each glass.

title: Pineapple juice
brief: Pineapple juice is rich in a variety of vitamins and minerals.
description: Pineapple juice is rich in a variety of vitamins and minerals.
